description: [Emotet](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0367) uses a copy of `certutil.exe` stored in a temporary directory for process hollowing, starting the program in a suspended state before loading malicious code.(Citation: emotet_trendmicro_mar2023)

external_references.description: Kenefick, I. (2023, March 13). Emotet Returns, Now Adopts Binary Padding for Evasion. Retrieved June 19, 2024.
